titleInfo.title: Roy King - Mule Skinner Blues - London 16049 (dub) -- Eddie Kirk - Away Out On The Mountain - Capitol 40285 (dub)

mods.abstract: Dub of Roy King's London release 16049 (side B), Mule Skinner Blues; followed by a dub of Eddie Kirk's Capitol release 40285 (side B), Away Out On The Mountain.
